item.title: Accor debuts its first ibis budget hotel in South Korea
item.description:
Accor, the leading international hotel operator in the Asia Pacific region and South Korea, has launched its first ibis budget brand hotel in South Korea: the ibis budget Ambassador Seoul Dongdaemun. Source: Accor. The Ibis budget Ambassador Seoul Dongdaemun. This newly constructed hotel offers 195 guest rooms and is situated north of Seoul’s Han River. The location is a bustling commercial area known for its blend of traditional markets and modern shopping centers...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/accor-debuts-its-first-ibis-budget-hotel-in-south-korea/
